selected_quotes: 30 years of editorial boards for 24 journals, 3800 editors. Almost none of these editors based in the Global South.
30 years of editorial boards for 24 journals, 3800 editors. Care to guess how many were based in the Global South?
Our new preprint on this important aspect of scientific publishing is out.
A persistent lack of International representation on editorial boards in environmental biology
on boards of 12 journals over 20 years, rarely see others from global south. No change over 20 yrs. And women from sout…
